sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO document (hash, content_id, name, user_name, date, md5hash) VALUES (#fileHash#, #contentId#, #fileName#, #userName#, NOW(), #md5hash#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE document d SET d.name=#fileName#, d.hash=#fileHash#, d.date=NOW(), d.md5hash=#md5hash# WHERE d.content_id = #contentId# AND d.hash=#fileHash#
sqlMap.select: SELECT FROM document d JOIN bibtex b USING (content_id) WHERE b.simhash$requestedSimHash$=#resourceHash# AND b.user_name = #userName# AND d.user_name = #userName# AND d.name = #fileName#
SELECT FROM document d JOIN bibtex b USING (content_id) WHERE b.simhash$requestedSimHash$ = #resourceHash# AND d.user_name = #userName# ORDER BY d.date DESC
SELECT FROM document d WHERE d.user_name=#userName# AND d.hash=#fileHash# AND d.content_id=#contentId#
SELECT count(*) AS ctr FROM document WHERE content_id > 0
SELECT count(*) AS ctr FROM document WHERE content_id = 0
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM document WHERE content_id = #contentId# AND user_name = #userName# AND name = #fileName#
DELETE FROM document WHERE content_id = #contentId# AND user_name = #userName# AND hash = #fileHash#
sqlMap.select: SELECT FROM document d WHERE content_id = #requestedContentId#
